import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import classes from "../styles/About.module.css"; import background from "../images/background.jpg"; export default function About() { return (

Welcome to Braving Counseling!

Hi, I'm Vicki (she/her)

I'm a licensed clinical social worker (LCWS) and therapist who is passionate about conscious parenting, neurodivergence, and women's issues. I hope to create a safe and healing space for you to share your story, whatever it may be.

Together we can tap into your strengths to work through trauma, difficult relationships, and challenges in your life.

About My Practice

Whatever your story may be, I hope to create a safe and healing space for you to share it. I believe that being seen and heard fully is an intricate part of the healing process. Together we can tap into your strengths to work through trauma, difficult relationships, and challenges in your life.

“There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.”

- Maya Angelou

I utilize a client-centered and trauma-informed framework to encourage growth and self-acceptance. I am passionate about conscious parenting, neurodivergence, and women's issues. I work with adults, teens, ADHD, Autism, and the LGBTQAI+ community. Creating and sustaining connection, radical self-acceptance, and mindfulness will be key in our work together.

We all have stories to share and things we strive to improve in our lives. I would be honored to work alongside you on your journey to your truest self.

) }
